Articles.Content:
I'm looking for a .craft file for an eve lander with science gathering. Hoping for 100-200 tons. All I can find is the craft files for the minimalist challenges, which are hard to fly because you have no margin for error.

No matter what I try I can't seem to get one working myself.

Thanks in advance!

Edited January 25, 2015 by herman

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95642-The-Eve-Rocks-Challenge

About half of the submissions provide their craft files. Most are single launch (that is, very big rockets on the pad, no docking or refueling later) but I'm sure you could adapt them to your needs. The challenge requires Kerbals to sit in a pod. You will get a huge margin of error if you replace the pod with a simple command seat.

For science gathering, keep in mind that *landing* stuff on Eve is easy and cheap, and that you can take the results from the instruments and store them in a pod. Or on a Kerbal, for that matter.
That's a good link. Any semi-balanced mods that might make it easier?
